name: Elyse Inferrera
title: Event Producer | Game Presentation | Sports Entertainment | Live Event Entertainment
location: Rancho Palos Verdes, California, United States

experience.title: UFL Game Day Entertainment and Fan Experience Consultant
experience.description:
Organize, advance, and execute game days for all 8 markets in the league and
produce special events beyond normal game operations: Draft, Town Halls,
playoffs, and Championship. Create all game scripts in ShoFlo and create/
deliver time sheets to Broadcast, Football Ops, and league staff. Oversee
the game day, operations crew, and stage managers, including scheduling,
event confirmations, and payroll. Manage all sponsorship inventory and ensure
accurate execution and all markets relating to videos, signage, and graphics.

experience.title: Stage Manager
experience.location: Greater Los Angeles Area, California, United States
experience.description:
Organize and facilitate in-stadium production and events. Work directly with
show producer to ensure pre-game and half-time events are properly executed
Outside LAFC Events:
- MLS All Star Game 2021 
- CONCACAF Championship 2023
- Copa Angelina 2022 & 2023
- Leagues Cup 2023

normalization_notes: Standardized company names; Converted dates to YYYY-MM format; Added 'California, United States' to LAFC location for clarity.
